item.description:
I posted this last year and folks seemed to enjoy it, the holidays are special so let's make it another fun year together :-)

Boston Pops Holiday Concert

The Boston Pops return to Manchester for a must see holiday concert on December 15th


Kick off your holiday season with Keith Lockhart, the Boston Pops, and vocal powerhouse Rockapella! For the first time ever, "America's Orchestra" joins America's leading a capella group for an unforgettable holiday show.

Enjoy unique takes on classic favorites and brand new originals, plus a special visit from Jolly Old' St. Nick and a time-honored audience sing along. Treat yourself and your loved ones to a holiday tradition that millions cherish!

We will sit together in SECTION 201C rows 1-20

I have 20 tickets on hold if we get more interest do not worry I am able to accomodate!!

****Cost: 38.00 per ticket All sales are final****

If you are interested I will need a check mailed to my address which will be furnished to folks that email me in private.

Payment due no later than*** 11/23/12***,  I will meet folks like I did last year in my town for car pooling please contact me if interested. Look for updates day of event in case of inclement weather.

I am open to suggestions for a nice place to eat within walking distance prior to the event, and if anyone wants to get a night cap after the show please post in the comment section.

Show Time : 7:30 Meet at 7:00PM Sharp IN THE LOBBY, then we will all head upstairs to see the show, please do not be late , it's very busy at the start of the show and we would all like to be seated and enjoy the opening together.

 

********************************************************************************************************************* I can meet folks interested in grabbing a bite at 5:PM at this upscale Italian Pizza Parlor Located across the street 2 short blocks from Verizon, those not wishing to eat see you at 7PM in the main lobbby I will have a meet up sign in hand..

"Portland Pie Co., 5PM

786 Elm Street Manchester 603-622-7437

 

Happy Holidays To All!!
item.how_to_find_us: I will leave my number closer to the date.
item.name: Boston Pops Holiday Concert Verizon Manchester Arena
